Back to Frédéric Chopin

Frédéric Chopin

Three Valses, op. 70

1829 (no. 3), 1833 (no. 1), 1841 (no. 2) · Chomiński 217–219 · Brown 40 (no. 3), 92 (no. 1), 138 (no. 2)

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 7' 30"

  • 1. G-flat major
  • 2. F minor
  • 3. D-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Henle · HN 131 · Walzer · ed. Ewald Zimmermann [nos. 1–2 in two versions]
  • Henle · HN 230 · Walzer · ed. Ewald Zimmermann [nos. 1–2 in two versions]
  • National Edition · 27 (B III) · Waltzes (B) · ed. Jan Ekier [nos. 1–2 in three versions]
  • Peters · EP 7575 · Waltzes · ed. Christophe Grabowski [no. 1 in two versions, and no. 2 in three versions]

1. G-flat major

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

2. F minor

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. D-flat major

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3
